attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically I'm always hearing all this 'Wales doesn't need england blah blah'; or 'Wales would be stronger if it was independant and so would England'. Well I propose that we literally dig up the ground around the border to Wales and let it float off into the distance so that we do not need to suffer their annoying rhetoric once-and-for-all! Then lets see how independant they are. AHAHAHA!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
